This card has to be filled for each pregnant woman by the service provider giving antenatal care. The woman 
must be encouraged to bring this card to the facility or outreach (VHSND) session whenever she comes for her 
ANC check-up
6.2 RCH Register
This register has columns to document the details of the antenatal care of each woman seen on a particular ANC 
day/session. The details of the woman must be entered immediately as she is examined and he
